TopicTitle: One01's Planes V2.1 ( Plane No.4 + BONUS)

Articles.Content:
ALL DOWNLOAD LINKS ARE ATTACHED!

Here are my most successful planes:

1) Short Range Fighter Jet

This is my best aircraft to date, capable of (almost) crossing an ocean, but fully able to land safely, as demonstrated by my Youtube video:

2) X-Wing Aircraft

Decided to make an X wing, and it took about 3 hours to make because of numerous failures, but here it is:

3) Quad Jet Plane

I finally made a working 4 Engine Fighter jet that can fly Quite stable when you don\'t make too fast movements, but control can be regained once lost. It was my quickest design so far, only taking about 10 minutes, but that was all I needed because it worked first time!

4) Twin Propeller Aircraft

For this one, I used the Damned Aerospace Mod (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10138.0)

It managed to fly around 340km north, but I\'m sure that with more fuel we could make it to the north pole (my goal!)

BONUS) Triple Fuselage Plane

Here\'s a Bonus plane! I had a youtube video for it, so I think it is a fun plane to modify and play around with, so here it is. (Sorry about the quality, I\'ve now got Vegas Pro, and I\'ve fixed the letter-boxing now!)

Thanks for visiting, I will upload more soon.

If you liked these planes, have a look at my youtube channel for more videos! (Note: I\'m still working on getting more videos, but there are still quite a few KSP videos for you there! http://www.youtube.com/user/one01x?feature=mhee
I\'ll be uploading probably two more on Saturday, but definitely Sunday.
Ok, Uploaded a new plane! Sorry for the wait, but I wanted to hold off from uploading until I could create a good plane. I\'ll make another one soon.

>Short range fighter

>Able to cross ocean

> ???

I\'d like to see what your long range fighters are like!

I\'ll call it long range when it can fly 300,000mi or a plane that can make it to the north pole, whichever comes first.

Thanks for watching. Also, I\'ll have the video for the 4 engine jet up soon. I think you\'ll like it.
i had a small problem, they wouldn\'t load, but im not sure what went wrong, i have the files in the right places
Sorry about that. I\'m not sure what could be wrong. If anyone else has this problem, please tell me so that I can fix it!

I\'ve got a week off from today, so I\'ll be able to upload a few planes! Please comment and vote on the poll so that I know what to build!

Thanks for your help!

Just Uploaded Plane No.4! Tell me what you want me to do by replying!

Another Mod, Propeller Plane or something else? please tell me!

Hi, Just had to completely re-install my computer (C Drive finally stopped) So I lost all my data. Luckily, I managed to upload all the videos that I had, but I lost a plane I was planning to video, and I lost my mods, but they are recoverable.

So, what do you guys want next? You have until I create a plane to decide (hopefully tomorrow if I\'m feeling up to it.)

Okay, I\'ll be making the plane today! Sorry for the wait, Internet\'s been down for a few days.

Also, I might make a new forum post. got any good ideas for a challenge?

At the moment, I\'m thinking of doing a challenge to get to the north pole (or close)
